title: Strengthening Medical Practice Competencies: Enhancing Instructional Design Capabilities Using Program Code Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze text/graphic representations of program code simulations displayed simultaneously across four frames.
Learners can visually interpret the code execution process by adjusting simulation speed and utilizing step-by-step execution features.
Learners can predict simulation outcomes and derive educational application strategies through code modification functionality.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
